setUIProperty

public static <T> void setUIProperty(javax.swing.JComponent c,
                                     java.lang.String propertyName,
                                     UIValue<T> uiValue,
                                     T oldValue,
                                     T newValue,
                                     boolean isUIResource,
                                     boolean revalidate,
                                     boolean repaint)
Set UI-value and fire propertyChangeEvent.

Type Parameters:
T - The UI-property type.
Parameters:
c - The related component.
propertyName - Name used to fire propertyChange event.
uiValue - The related UIValue object.
oldValue - Old value.
newValue - New value.
isUIResource - New value is a UI-resource.
revalidate - True means revalidate after property change.
repaint - True means repaint after property change.
